list_definition.definition: (plural antennae-niː) a feeler of an insect

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: A cockroach uses its antennae to smell decomposing food.

list_definition.definition: (plural antennas) American a wire or rod (or a set of these) able to send or receive radio waves etc); aerial British
